text: Starting up a new company or a business always involves a lot of risk. A number of startups fail even before they can reach a certain level. The Lean Startup: How Today's Entrepreneurs Use Continuous Innovation To Create Radically Successful Businesses is about using a new and innovative approach called ‘Lean Startup’ to revolutionise the world of business.  When an individual or a group of individuals starts a new business, there is always an air of uncertainty prevailing over their minds. What they want to do is to create something meaningful that will sustain, proving all the uncertainties futile.
